p: Multivariate analysis showed that gender, combined lymph node dissection, maximum thyroid diameter, a second surgery, preoperative blood calcium, and transient hypoparathyroidism were related ( P < 0.05). The OR value of gender (male) is 0.686, 95% CI is (0.535, 0.805); the OR value of combined lymphatic dissection is 2.974, 95% CI is (2.155, 4.103); the OR value of whether lymph node dissection is 1.569, 95% CI It was (1.122, 2.194); the OR value of the maximum thyroid diameter was 1.192, 95% CI was (1.041, 1.364); the OR value of preoperative blood calcium was 0.028, 95% CI was (0.004, 0.203) ( Table 2).
